name: Unraveled (vjvalve)
description:
Quick Notice: the buttons to "detach" certain body parts are currently located on the top left corner, it's a bit hard to see them.

Notes:

*Lots of the animations (all walk cycles) are done but we were unable to implement them into this first draft on time.

*We'll be making our own custom tilemaps as well so those are on the way

*We'll be primarily focusing on the mechanics of the game so that it's hopefully simple to put together all the puzzles and environment as we go.

Question:

How do you feel about the brief puzzle mechanics?

Were you able to figure them out relatively quickly with a bit of trial and error?

Did you get an understanding of the physics of the current body parts that were present?
